name: existentialist
content:
Add to word list

a person who believes in a philosophy (= system of ideas) according to which the world has no meaning and each person is alone and completely responsible for his or her own actions: He's a pessimistic existentialist. The existentialists have something to tell us about taking charge of our own future. See
existentialism
More examplesFewer examplesShe lived among the existentialists of post-war Paris. He considered Nietzsche to be an early existentialist. The new economy calls for strategies created by existentialists who understand freedom.
